modals.description: Warning, deletion is permanent! You will need to create a new account to participate in future SGN events.

association.title: Association profile
association.name: Name
association.tagDescription: Your association's tag will be visible in front of your members' nicknames participating in tournaments.
association.studentNumber: Number of students in the school

parameters.title: Settings
parameters.description: The slug is your association's unique identifier. Your association page will be available at this address:
parameters.invitationDescription: You must share this code with members who want to join your association.

association.transferDescription: It is better to transfer the association to someone else than to delete it. You can only delete the association if you are the only member, otherwise contact your SGN regional manager.
association.notMember: You are part of the association
association.none: You are not in any association...

2fa.title: Two-factor authentication
2fa.description: Two-factor authentication is an extra security method to protect your account. When enabled, you will need to enter a verification code at each login.
2fa.enablePrompt: Are you sure you want to enable two-factor authentication?
2fa.disablePrompt: Are you sure you want to disable two-factor authentication?

game.discordDescription: We need your Discord ID to contact you during your matches.

status.title: Student status
status.name: First and last name
status.description: To participate in tournaments, you must provide proof of your student status ({certificate} or {card}). Middle and high school students {not} considered as "students".

login.enterToken: Enter the token generated on your app
